Movie_title: Bad Times at the El Royale
Stars: ['Jeff Bridges, Cynthia Erivo, Dakota Johnson, Jon Hamm']
Scenario: ["Early 1970s. Four strangers check in at the El Royale Hotel. The hotel is deserted, staffed by a single desk clerk. Some of the new guests' reasons for being there are less than innocent and some are not who they appear to be."]

Directors: ['Directors: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski ']
Stars: ['Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Hugh Grant, Hugo Weaving']
Scenario: ['An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.']

Stars: ['George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon']
Scenario: ['Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.']

Stars: ["Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent D'Onofrio"]
Scenario: ['A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.']

Stars: ['Ward Horton, Annabelle Wallis, Alfre Woodard, Tony Amendola']
Scenario: ['A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.']

Stars: ['Helen Hunt, Jon Tenney, Owen Teague, Judah Lewis']
Scenario: ['Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy.']

Stars: ['Erich Anderson, Judie Aronson, Peter Barton, Kimberly Beck']
Scenario: ['After being announced dead and taken to a morgue, Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives, escapes from the hospital, and stalks a group of friends renting a house in the countryside near Crystal Lake.']

Stars: ['Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans, Busy Philipps, Maitland Ward']
Scenario: ['Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson sisters from a kidnapping plot.']

Stars: ['Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden, Helena Bonham Carter']
Scenario: ["When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger."]

Stars: ['Emilia Clarke, Sam Claflin, Janet McTeer, Charles Dance']
Scenario: ["A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of."]

Stars: ['Addison Rae, Tanner Buchanan, Madison Pettis, Rachael Leigh Cook']
Scenario: ["A teenage girl sets out to give a nebbish classmate the ultimate high school makeover. An updated remake of the 1999 film, 'She's All That'."]

Stars: ['Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway, Mindy Kaling']
Scenario: ["Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala."]

Stars: ['Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Philip Seymour Hoffman']
Scenario: ['Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.']

Stars: ['Michael Douglas, Deborah Kara Unger, Sean Penn, James Rebhorn']
Scenario: ['After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.']

Stars: ['Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Allen Leech']
Scenario: ['During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.']

Stars: ['Jason Schwartzman, Bill Murray, Olivia Williams, Seymour Cassel']
Scenario: ['A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.']

Stars: ['Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman, Ray Liotta']
Scenario: ['Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.']

Stars: ['Kåre Hedebrant, Lina Leandersson, Per Ragnar, Henrik Dahl']
Scenario: ['Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.']

Stars: ['Owen Wilson, Jason Sudeikis, Christina Applegate, Jenna Fischer']
Scenario: ['Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.']

Stars: ['Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler, Harry Connick Jr., Lisa Kudrow']
Scenario: ['A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.']

Stars: ['Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn']
Scenario: ['When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.']

Stars: ['Ginnifer Goodwin, Kate Hudson, Colin Egglesfield, John Krasinski']
Scenario: ["Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé."]

Stars: ['Camilla Belle, Tommy Flanagan, Katie Cassidy, Tessa Thompson']
Scenario: ['During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.']

Stars: ['Rod Taylor, Tippi Hedren, Jessica Tandy, Suzanne Pleshette']
Scenario: ['A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.']

Stars: ['Kristy Swanson, Donald Sutherland, Paul Reubens, Rutger Hauer']
Scenario: ["Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires."]

Stars: ['Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga']
Scenario: ['Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.']

Stars: ['Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgård, Stacy Martin, Shia LaBeouf']
Scenario: ['A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.']

Stars: ['Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black, Mindy Kaling']
Scenario: ['After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.']

Stars: ['Bryan Cranston, Koyu Rankin, Edward Norton, Bob Balaban']
Scenario: ["Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog."]

Stars: ['Sean Penn, Tim Robbins, Kevin Bacon, Emmy Rossum']
Scenario: ['The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.']

Stars: ['Kiana Madeira, Ashley Zukerman, Gillian Jacobs, Olivia Scott Welch']
Scenario: ["The origins of Sarah Fier's curse are finally revealed as history comes full circle on a night that changes the lives of Shadysiders forever."]

Stars: ['Tom Guiry, Mike Vitar, Art LaFleur, Patrick Renna']
Scenario: ['In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.']

Stars: ['Chris Sarandon, William Ragsdale, Amanda Bearse, Roddy McDowall']
Scenario: ['A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.']

Stars: ['Jonny Lee Miller, Angelina Jolie, Jesse Bradford, Matthew Lillard']
Scenario: ['Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.']

Stars: ['Jordana Brewster, Clea DuVall, Laura Harris, Josh Hartnett']
Scenario: ["When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, he decides to investigate the bizarre happenings."]

Stars: ['Karen Gillan, Brenton Thwaites, Katee Sackhoff, Rory Cochrane']
Scenario: ['A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.']

Stars: ['Adam Driver, Scarlett Johansson, Julia Greer, Azhy Robertson']
Scenario: ["Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together."]

Movie_title: The Hobbit - The Battle of the Five Armies
Stars: ['Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Cate Blanchett']
Scenario: ['Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.']

Stars: ['Sandra Bullock, Trevante Rhodes, John Malkovich, Sarah Paulson']
Scenario: ['Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.']

Stars: ['James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Kevin Bacon']
Scenario: ["In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them."]

Stars: ['Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Shiv Panditt, Pranay Pachauri']
Scenario: ['The story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, who shot to fame and became a household name during the Kargil War in 1999.']

Stars: ['Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott, Ella Balinska, Elizabeth Banks']
Scenario: ["When a young systems engineer blows the whistle on a dangerous technology, Charlie's Angels are called into action, putting their lives on the line to protect us all."]

Stars: ['Rosamund Pike, Peter Dinklage, Eiza González, Dianne Wiest']
Scenario: ['A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.']

Stars: ['Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson']
Scenario: ['A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.']

Stars: ['Morfydd Clark, Caoilfhionn Dunne, Jennifer Ehle, Marcus Hutton']
Scenario: ['Follows a pious nurse who becomes dangerously obsessed with saving the soul of her dying patient.']

Stars: ['Cassandra Peterson, Phil Rubenstein, Larry Flash Jenkins, Damita Jo Freeman']
Scenario: ['Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.']

Stars: ['Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez, Ryan McCluskey, Oscar Pearce']
Scenario: ['A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.']

Stars: ['Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Greg Grunberg']
Scenario: ['A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.']

Stars: ['Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer']
Scenario: ['After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.']

Stars: ['Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, Shannen Doherty, Lisanne Falk']
Scenario: ["At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jocks dominate and all the popular girls are named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and mysterious new kid to give teen angst a body count."]
